text:
Hi everybody,
We heard it was hard to map legacy list id's to the new v3 list id's so we've added new endpoints to do so.  The new functionality is documented <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/lists|here> under *Migrate list IDs from v1 to v3 endpoints.* Please let us know if there are any modifications we can make in order to improve this experience.
